guideBot.initialMessage: Welcome to the Seller Information step! Here, we need to gather some details about the property owner(s). First, tell us if the property is owned by a single person, a couple, or multiple individuals. If there are multiple owners, please specify how many (up to 5). Then, for each owner, we'll need their full name and date of birth. Contact information like email and phone, as well as current address details, are optional but helpful. If you've already provided an address in a previous step (e.g., for the property itself), you might see an option to reuse that address for an owner to save you time. Let me know if you have any questions as you fill out this section!

responses.po_box_address: For residential address verification, a P.O. Box is generally not sufficient. We require a physical residential address.
responses.information_usage: Your information is used to process your application, verify identity, and tailor our services to your needs, in accordance with our privacy policy.
responses.data_security: We take data security very seriously. All personal information is encrypted and stored securely. Please see our privacy policy for more details.
